Scenario: A scenario with four seats left and unique vote totals.

OPL
4 seats
16 ballots cast
6 candidates

Pike,D    5 votes
Foster,D  4 votes
Deutsch,R 3 votes
Borg,R    2 votes
Jones,R   1 votes
Smith,I   0 votes

[Pike,D]    -- Should be the first winner

[Foster,D]    -- Should be the second winner

[Deutsch,R]   -- Should be the third winner

[Borg,R]    -- Should be the last winner

The result should have these four as the winners.
